alert.note: Alert for Camden; Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 8:29PM EDT until August 08 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Nassau County in northeastern Florida... Camden County in southeastern Georgia... Glynn County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 829 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jekyll Island, or 7 miles south of Brunswick, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Fernandina Beach, Woodbine, Dock Junction, Kings Bay Base, Country Club Estates, and Kings Ferry. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
